events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on the candidate’s experience and resume keywords.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate's application to ensure smooth communication going forward.
The initial phone screening was completed, and the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in continuing to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the senior engineering team to assess problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing strong coding ability and system design knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit and review company policies and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the candidate is excited about the opportunity and aligned with company values.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate, detailing compensation, start date, and benefits package.
